events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store, but it does not fit me properly. I would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The system has identified this case involves a refund request based on the customer's description and keywords.
A customer support agent has been assigned to handle the refund request for the returned jacket.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I’m here to help you with your refund request for the jacket that didn’t fit.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket has been returned or if you need assistance with the return process?
My order number is 789654321. I haven’t sent the jacket back yet because I wasn’t sure about the return steps.
Thank you for the details. I have emailed you the return instructions and prepaid shipping label for a smooth refund process.
Thanks for the quick reply and the return label, that really helps me a lot in processing the refund.
We have confirmed receipt of your returned jacket and processed your refund. The amount should appear on your card within 3-5 business days.
Just checking in to confirm you have received your refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with today.
Since your refund was successful and there are no outstanding issues, we are closing this case now. Thank you for contacting us.
We have sent you a short satisfaction survey to help us improve our service. Your feedback is much appreciated.
